channel.title: MaxSpeed : An Original Media For Gamers Production
channel.itunes:subtitle: MaxSpeed
channel.itunes:author: Speedyf40,Maxmaps,Kae
channel.description: The show that goes extremely fast and nowhere in particular! Speedyf40, Maxmaps, and Kae cover all things gaming along with whatever else gets in the way!

image.title: MaxSpeed : An Original Media For Gamers Production

item.title: MaxSpeed - We talked about Video Games....Eventually
item.description: We talked about things that are entertaining to you and we talked about OnLive, PS3 Hits New High, and video games :P

item.title: MaxSpeed - Fun as Hell
item.description: Activision Confirms Layoffs People, We bitch about Sony, LEGOS, and news about games Dua!

item.title: MaxSpeed - Kae is on Fire!!!!!!
item.description: Kae started talking about games and then he kept on talking....who is this Kae and where is the real one? Go Kae!

item.title: MaxSpeed - Sex with your ears
item.description: Main Topic: Over Rated Games? Infinity Ward,Modern Warfare 2 and lot's of FPS talk .... and Dragon Age Origins

item.title: MaxSpeed - Bitches love the Wii
item.description: We talked about How woman love the Wii and how this is the worst Q4 in years

item.title: MaxSpeed - Let's raise money for Tiger Woods
item.itunes:summary: Let's raise money for Tiger Woods
item.description: The soldiers of World War I were the first people to use the modern flushing toilet. The inventor: Thomas Crapper

item.title: MaxSpeed - You Just Spoilered Santa!
item.description: Kae kicks Speedy in the Balls then gives spoilers on Santa for all the little kiddies. :(

item.title: MaxSpeed - 3 years later & We are still kicking it in high gear!
item.itunes:summary: 3 years later & We are still kicking it in high gear!
item.description: Its been a long strange trip, but we made it 3 years. Thanks you guys!

item.title: MaxSpeed - The year of the PS3...We mean it
item.itunes:summary: The year of the PS3...We mean it
item.description: "This is the year of the PS3" - Speedyf40

item.title: MaxSpeed - See Maxspeed in 3D!
item.description: 3d gaming, Kae's word questioned over LFD2 and Killing Floor, HDTVs, Child's Play says no to a donation, Dragon Age on consoles and the new Expansion, Poll says Halo:Reach will be best selling game of 2010, Infinity Ward won't be working on Modern Warfare 3 but might be on CoD MMO, Project Natal uses 10-15 % of Xbox360 Processing power and could come out by Holidays 2010, Most of our audience think 3d Gaming will be a fad, and Annul wins Jumping Rants!

item.title: MaxSpeed - I Am Not Yelling, That's Just How I Talk
item.itunes:summary: I Am Not Yelling, That's Just How I Talk
item.description: Virtual Goods, Box games vs. Digital copy, Collector's edition vs. Standard, Expansions - what should you pay? Micro-transactions - the good and the really bad. 1.38 Billions sold in Virtual Goods, Tetris top selling mobile game of all time, Sony's Motion Controller, Wii adult title in black cases, Kids have 8 hours of media a day, Real life P2P, Kindal has an apps store?, Sims 3 top selling game of 2009, Tekken Movie Trailer, A Majora's Mask Sequel?, PS3 sell 3 million units in UK, ESPN on Xbox Live, Emails, FF I & II on Iphone, Elder Scrolls MMO?, and No Half Life Game this year. AlmightyFarseer wins Jumping Rants and Most people have bought Virtual Goods
